title: Great application
comment: Thank you bhante, anjali.

title: Simple and Elegant
comment: Easy to set up, works in the background, and the supplied sounds are pleasant. No ads. Nice work!
Great for meditation

title: It works..
comment: So simple it's.... Zen !

title: Simple, perfect
comment: A great meditation timer, great job, thanks for developing it. Very classy icons and graphics, choice of start and finish bells. Great!

title: Simplicity and Style
comment: Simple and functional interface - it is my favorite and a joy to use.  What I would still love to see is the possibility to pre-define more than one multiple timer (maybe a second row, even though I can see the difficulty to display the length of each period for distinguishing between more of them)  Additionally, an option to prevent the device from rotating, e.g. forcing the app into portrait mode, would be great. I would also like to have a possibility to choose where the remaining time is shown because - depending on the background image - the middle of the screen can sometimes be inconvenient.  A request that's a little over the top :):  I love the sound of the "Three Bells", it would be great if this same sound was available as one single bell.  Thanks for a wonderful app :)

title: Most of the advanced features work on Xiaomi MI 3
comment: While the basic app works just fine. And its quite good. However, Most of the advanced features like Reminders, Auto Silent Mode, Auto Airplane Mode etc don't work.

title: Perfect
comment: I lead a weekly meditation group, and this app is perfect: customizable, easy-to-use, and reliable! Thanks!

title: Simple, customizable, and effective
comment: This app is the best meditation timer I've used. The UI isn't perfect, but the chimes are customizable and free. I like hearing three chimes at the end of my sittings and this makes that easy to set up. You can set a visual representation for time remaining that's a nice caligraphic circle. It doesn't have any social networking features, which was also a plus for me.

title: HP 7 g2 1311 kitkat
comment: Simple,  useful,  beautiful
Great feature supporting start and end sounds. For meditators who needs chanting from sounds files to start and end their session.

title: Outstanding! Simple just how it should be. Thank you.
comment: Outstanding! Simple just how it should be. Thank you.

title: Not reliable
comment: The timer is a great concept, but the timer is not consistent with the gong/bell tone after the countdown has finished. Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesnt. Please fix this bug. I use it for yoga and I stay in a posture and after some time I realise the countdown had finished but there was no alarm.
Not a lot of fussy options. It's a timer, and an pleasantly easy one at that.
Excellent. Many options of sounds available. Just what i needed. Simple and elegant.

title: Best
comment: Very useful app for meditation

title: Great app
comment: Does exactly what it says on the tin.
Just what i wanted. I was going to get my nephew to write me an app that does just this. One year later, still the best meditation timer out there.
I like it a lot, but it gets stuck while auto repeating or in advanced mode. Any chance to fix this?

title: Thank you!
comment: Works well on my tablet. Thanks for making it free :-)

title: Great, simple meditation timer
comment: I've been looking for a simple timer that does not burn battery, is easy to use, and allows me to select the tone for the starting and ending of the sitting. This is it!
Nice!

title: It's exactly the right timer for yoga
comment: Keeps me from reducing my pose time

title: Just what I needed
comment: Very nice app, please add the possibility of delaying the first bell some time.

title: Sencillo, práctico y estético
comment: Gracias

title: Simple but effective
comment: This is a simple but elegant app. I use it regularly for meditation and can't fault it.

title: I like it...but
comment: It's a shame it doesn't have chimes that you can set to stop your mind from wondering thereby bringing beginners like me back to focus
You could set a repeating chime for say two minutes. The repeat option is in the settings page.

title: Just what I needed
comment: this app is everything I need in a meditation timer.

title: All you need for meditation
comment: Aesthetic and feature rich. The best meditation timer.

title: Thank you Bhante Yuttadhammo
comment: (Thanks for fixing the crashes on Samsung Galaxy Nexus.) I was hoping someone who seriously meditates would write an app with a choice of bells. I couldn't have asked for more. Thank you. A wonderful app. Sadhu sadhu sadhu
Glad to hear it :)

title: Good timer...
comment: The only addition I could wish for is a setting to run the 3 timer settings one after the other instead of just repeating the selected timer.
Can you try the latest version and let me know if it works?

title: Good idea!
comment: Really like how you can manually preset up to 3 different time lengths. The bell sounds are very nice too, very natural sounding.

title: Nice app..
comment: Meditation Timer..

title: Exactly right
comment: Perfect for spiritual practice and other timing needs
Best one i saw on android platform

title: Wonderful, simple.
comment: The best of many I've tried. You would think a timer and a bell would be easy, but judging by the apps available it seems it is not. This app manages to get it right and doesn't even need toms of permissions to do it.

Could have been the best of all meditation timers I've ever tried if it can set start and end sounds using custom sounds from mp3 files properly.  I need it to insert start and end chanting for my meditation.
Bell sounds are abrasive

title: Simple & efficient
comment: Works well as a timer one can let run, stop, or restart. Has 3 time presets. Realistic bell sound; sound decays (fades gradually) as a real bell would. Doesn't go on too long.  Different sounds to choose from! File very small in size. A nice addition would be to allow timer presets to activate automatically as each timer finishes. Example: as timer 1 rings, timer 2 would begin. I like this timer very much, though. Thank you.
Awesome
Best timer out there!

title: Perfect
comment: Simple and effective but at the same time well thought out with just the right amount of options

title: Sound stopped working
comment: I liked it until the sound stopped working.  Now it's fairly useless.
Can you send an email to info@sirimangalo.org describing the problem; the sound works fine here.

title: Love this awesome beautiful app, but widget doesn't keep countdown.
comment: Rooted Kindle Fire 1st Gen (JB 4.1)

title: Near perfect
comment: Simple n easy. Would be perfected with a short delay between the time the app is activated until the first bell sounds so I have time to put my phone down and get into my meditation posture.

title: Less is more
comment: Simple and beautiful app. Got this one after trying out several others. Has exactly what you need in a meditation timer and no unnecessary add-ons. Lovely selection of four bell sounds. Using it to time meditation and yin yoga practice. Thanks for making this!

title: Great App!
comment: Simple but nice. Thank you very much.

title: Great app + suggestion
comment: Use the app for my yoga class, several months so far. Stable, smooth work, nice sound, does what it's for.  Do you mind adding the loops/total time counter? Say small gray digits in the lower right corner. More informative, esp at the end of a workout ( class, practice, whatever). Great thanks.

title: Great app!!
comment: Does exactly what it says and doesn't require crazy permissions. Great job!
simple to use and wonderful!

title: Simple and effective.
comment: Just what I was looking for.

title: Sound stopped working after update
comment: No other apps running. Fresh reboot. Other apps sound works fine. Verified sound volume is up. Verified app sound settings are set. But no longer makes start or stop sounds test or live.  Wish I hadn't updated.
Did you check the settings or try the latest update? If you email me, I can try to help figure out what's wrong.
Thank you for making this beautiful and simple app.  I was looking for a timer with a pleasant sound to end my meditation.

title: Stopped keeping tablet awake, and doesn't chime at
comment: Had some issues with app keeping my device awake as desired. Dev jumped in and fixed it within a day. Now I'm very pleased with it.  Edit: After using the app for a number of months... I am nearsighted. Having the circle animation make it much easier to quickly note how far along I am in my session. While I have considered other apps, because I like the idea of having a tracking component, the animation keeps me with this one.
Great to hear it works again :)
Everything that's needed in a meditation timer.

title: Elegant design and useful
comment: Elegant design and useful!

title: Great minimal application
comment: This does exactly what I want it to do. No less, no more.

title: One request
comment: Beautifully simple timer, but would you please add the option (check box) to run the three preset timers consecutively?   I would like to set first for 30 sec to get settled, the second for the first half of the session and the third for the second half.

title: Good but...
comment: Not as good as Zazen Meditation Timer.

title: Limited
comment: Would work well if this app allowed variations in timers.  For Instance: 2 Minutes + 2:30 Min + 2 Min + 2:30 Min + 20 Min.
It's just a simple timer... what you are asking for is outside of the scope of this app, I'm sorry. Still, only two stars?

title: Elegant
comment: Timer can auto repeat. Elegant design.

title: Perfect timer.
comment: This is exactly what I've been looking for in a meditation timer. It has everything I need and nothing I don't.

title: Very elegant
comment: Thank you. I use this app every day.

title: A fantastic app
comment: Only prob... Had to reset the "media volume" (gear symbol that shows when a volume button is pressed) on my Sammy Note 8 as I had it set to 0 and couldn't hear the sounds.

title: Minimalist, elegant, ad free
comment: I love this timer! It is simple, to the point and very easy to use. It allows flexibility in how you are notified; vibrate, sound, popup, LED flash arecall options. My favorite feature is that you can adjust the sound volume as a % of your device media sound volume, so if you want it to be quiter than most sounds you don't have to readjust device settings when starting/finishing with the timer.
Awesome. Easy. Simple

title: Fantastic!
comment: This is exactly what I was looking for! There is a nice variety of sounds, so I can choose what I need for today. The app is very simple and straightforward. I am especially happy that I don't have to have all my notifications on to hear the sounds. Other timers are set to notifications, not media. Overall, lovely lovely!
Beautiful

title: Simple and pretty
comment: Excellent program. I like it better than all the other timers on the market

title: Love this app
comment: After the latest update the sound volume is really low - even though it's turned to max, as are all my other volumes, including media players. Still love this app tho. The sounds are fantastic, the bell-sound resonates as if I had a monk in the room timing me with a meditation bowl. Beautiful.
Sorry, will revert the bell sound, which is quieter - make sure you have the sound volume set to 100% in preferences

title: Clean and simple
comment: Exactly what I was looking for...a simple, straight-forward meditation timer, with start and end bells and a few presets. This is really all you need.
Simply elegant

title: NO PERMISSIONS!
comment: which  is just amazing nowadays :)  nice and simple yet I'd welcome some presets system, to have, say, one minute preparation, then 20 meditation, then one min out of it..

title: Great sound.
comment: I love the simplicity of this app. I also love the different bell options. It makes meditation seem less like a race (unlike the timer that came preloaded on my phone).

title: Good overall
comment: Nice features. Very responsive developer. One issue - widget's CPU usage is high.
Hopefully fixed in latest version - please let me know by email if it's not.

title: Elegant, simple, good options, no permissions required!
comment: Great

title: Good design, would like one more feature.
comment: Nice to be able to choose your own sound. As a feature request, I would like to be able to choose which presets play sound and which don't, so that I can set a silent preparation time. As a workaround, I can set a short preset before the long preset sitting period, and set the sounds only to play at the end of the presets, but then I can't choose a different sound for the beginning and end of the sitting period. But anyway, Good Job!
I could just add an optional preparation time before the timer starts... not sure how difficult that would be.

title: Sound does not work after last update
comment: This is a great app. Evrything is working fine until the last update. The sound does not work when countdown is done. Please fix this.
Should work with latest update.  Please email me if it doesn't.

title: Like this, but sound doesn't always work
comment: I love the elegance of this timer, but now when I preset meditation times, it counts down but there is no sound at the end of the meditation period. It was working fine before.
The latest version may have fixed this.

title: Best timer!
comment: Melodious sounds, and elegant graphics, and simplicity of us make this app. my favorite.  Thanks for adding a separate volume so I can listen to music while the timer is running!

title: Lovely, but..
comment: Really great timer, but the widget doesn't work, which is a shame because it's so pretty.  Will rate 5 stars when widget works on my experia ion
Please email me about this... The widget works for me, but if I know what android version you use, I can check out out.

title: Love it!
comment: The best meditation timer on Android.

title: Great app
comment: Adding volume control for the bell/sound will make it perfect.
Please see if this fixed in 2.5 - it should now be controllable via media volume.

title: Love this simple timer!
comment: Excellent and light weight timer is quite pleasing to hear. Thank you!

title: Beautiful simplicity
comment: Elegant and useful timer. It does everything I need. Nothing more. Simply Perfect.

title: Great!
comment: Simple yet useful. My only request is that more versions of singing bowls be added, perhaps two more with a lower pitch

Thanks for the feedback; rather than add lots of sounds that would make the apk quite large, you can use your own custom sounds via the preferences.  I'm updating the singing bowl to a new sound in the next release.

title: the perfect timer
comment: simple, easy, lightweight and gorgeous, it's become my favourite alarm app. i use it at work, in meditation and for cooking. great.
Works great!

title: Well done
comment: Simple and clean. Nice sounds. Thank you.

title: Best for long time sitting
comment: Nice and clear design after become used, no much words. Simplicity is great. This is great app for vipassana continuous for long sitting. Though no stages in between. Would like to hear bells of a better quality. No ads which would not be possible. Excellent keep on!

title: Simple and beautiful....
comment: Wonderful little app. I just wish I could have a setting that would give the option of playing the soft chime and bell sounds throughout meditation.

title: Love it!
comment: Super useful for staying on track for tasks as well. Have recommended it to friends. Please don't add on more permissions.

title: It's working with my Motorola Milestone 3
comment: Thanks to Yuttadhammo, I can now use it on my phone for timing my meditation sessions. He has patiently sorted out the problem I had with the phone's notification ringtone overriding the application's tones using the 'force custom tone' feature. It took about four changes, but now it's perfect. I hope others will try making it part of their own meditation practice. Excellent, Greg.

title: Simple and works
comment: It does what it supposed to, great little app. Thanks!

title: Simple & effective
comment: Easy to set.

title: Simplicity in itself
comment: Very good. No tricks. God bless yer cotton socks.

title: Does what it is supposed to do
comment: Simple and with no new age woodo

title: M
comment: I love it when it works but as a timer it doesn't work all the time when you're in another app. But for medition it's great.
Ok

title: Very good!
comment: Thank you very much. It could replace the timer apps easily.

title: Clear as a bell
comment: Hits the spot with sound and clean UI. Thank you brother!
